CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 6, 1974, pg. 2 reads: " "Miss Torch" And Youngsters - Looking at the young and beautiful Mrs. Cherry Raymond who is this year's "Miss Torch" for the United Fund Health-O-Rama, it is rather difficult to believe that the two adorable little girls are her daughters. They are Toni Raymond, 6 (left), and Lisa Raymond, 5.  Pictured at the Sickle Cell booth they prove that there is no age limit when it comes to lending a hand to a worthy cause. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: United Fund Health-O-Rama's "Miss Torch" Cherry Raymond standing with daughters Toni Raymond left, and Lisa Raymond right, in Sickle Cell booth at United Fund Health-O-Rama
